contents: The diagram shows the eye-color genotypes of two parents. The top shows the genotype of the father, and the alleles he has to offer (bb) his child. The left shows the alleles of the mother, and the alleles she has to offer her child (Bb). The capital ‘B’ refers to brown eyes, and is a dominant trait. The lower case ‘b’ refers to blue eyes, and is a recessive trait.
